description:
The next coolest thing to a bookcase door and secret passage. This discrete black box opens to reveal a swing-out bike hook, while the housing doubles as a tire pad to keep your walls unmarked. Fits most bikes, but you may want the longer bar for fat bikes, big tires or deep profile road bike rims.

  • Powder coated steel
  • Hinge design allows bike to swing left or right
  • Separate lower wheel bumper stabilizes bike and prevents swaying
  • Load capacity 22.6kg
  • Assembled to pivot left, but can be reversed
  • Dimensions are 185 x 90 x 16mm
name: Feedback Sports Velo Hinge Bicycle Storage Rack
